name: @rharel/webext-private-bookmarks
description: WebExtension that enables a password-protected bookmark folder.

scripts.prepare: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r source/_locales source/icons/main/private-bookmarks-*.png build && cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js* build
scripts.prepare-chrome: npm run prepare && cp source/manifest-chrome.json build/manifest.json
scripts.prepare-firefox: npm run prepare && cp source/manifest-firefox.json build/manifest.json
scripts.watch: parcel watch source/options_ui/options_page.html source/main_ui/main_page.html source/core/background.ts --dist-dir build
scripts.build: parcel build source/options_ui/options_page.html source/main_ui/main_page.html source/core/background.ts --dist-dir build --no-optimize --no-cache && web-ext build
scripts.build-chrome: npm run prepare-chrome && npm run build
scripts.build-firefox: npm run prepare-firefox && npm run build && web-ext lint

author: Raoul Harel
